TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem implements class System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView

summary.span: 定义 所实现的方法和属性，它们可用于指定添加特定类型的项。

span.span: Defines methods and properties that a implements to enable specifying adding items of a specific type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 接口，应用程序开发人员可以指定要添加到集合的对象的类型。The interface enables application developers to specify what type of object to add to a collection. 此接口扩展 ，因此你可以在集合中添加、编辑和删除项。This interface extends , so you can add, edit, and remove items in a collection. 添加 方法，该方法采用添加到集合中的对象。 adds the method, which takes an object that is added to the collection. 如果要添加的集合和对象具有以下一个或多个特性，则此方法很有用：This method is useful when the collection and objects that you want to add have one or more of the following characteristics: - 中的对象属于不同类型。The objects in the are different types. - 对象没有无参数的构造函数。The objects do not have a parameterless constructor. - 该对象已经存在。The object already exists. - 需要将 `null` 对象添加到集合中。You want to add a `null` object to the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例使用户能够将各种类型的项添加到集合中。The following example enables a user to add various types of items to a collection. 用户可以输入新项并提交该项或取消该事务。The user can enter a new item and submit the entry or cancel the transaction. 该示例从 的 属性获取一个 并创建一个对象，该对象的类型由用户决定。The example gets an from the property of a and creates an object, whose type is determined by the user. 然后，该示例调用 方法，将该对象添加到集合中。Then the example calls the method to add the object to the collection. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#mainwindowlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mainwindowlogic)] 下面的示例为前面的示例创建用户界面。The following example creates the user interface for the previous example. [!code-xaml[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml#mainwindowxaml)] 下面的示例创建用户为新项添加数据的 `AddItemWindow`。The following example creates the `AddItemWindow` in which the user adds data for a new item. [!code-xaml[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/additem.xaml#additemxaml)] 下面的示例演示了 `AddItemWindow`的逻辑。The following example shows the logic for the `AddItemWindow`. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/additem.xaml.cs#additemlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/additemwindow.xaml.vb#additemlogic)] 下面的示例显示在前面的示例中使用的数据类型和集合。The following example shows the data types and collection that is used in the previous examples. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#Data](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/data.cs#data)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#Data](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/data.vb#data)]

param.name: newItem
param.span: 要添加到集合中的对象。

span.span: The object to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.
The object that is added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法时，它会开始添加事务。When you calling the method, it begins an add transaction. 应调用 或 方法来结束添加事务。You should call the or methods to end the add transaction. 新项始终出现在 "集合" 视图中。A new item always appears in the collection view. 在调用 时，应用于该视图的任何筛选、排序或分组都会应用于新项。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 方法，将对象添加到集合中。The following example calls the method to add an object to a collection. 有关完整的示例，请参见 类。For the complete example, see the class. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#mainwindowlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mainwindowlogic)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanAddNewItem As Boolean
public: property bool CanAddNewItem { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以向集合中添加指定的对象。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a specified object can be added to the collection.

value.span: 如果可以将指定的对象添加到集合中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a specified object can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 属性，则可以通过调用 方法指定要添加到集合中的对象。If the property is `true`, you can specify an object to add to the collection by calling the method. 如果无法使用 将项添加到集合中，则 `false` 。 is `false` if items cannot be added to the collection by using . 如果 `false`，则仍可以使用 方法添加对象。If is `false`, you may still be able to add an object by using the method. 例如，可以使用 将对象添加到 ADO.NET 源，但不能使用 。For example, you can add objects to an ADO.NET source by using , but not by using .
